title: Firebase Config - enable_review_prompt TRUE
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: Ticket Master configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "enable_review_prompt" as true
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)


GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store without a pre-existing rating
custom_steps: WHEN the user transitions to Home Tab
custom_expected: THEN the app rating prompt is shown

title: Firebase Config - enable_review_prompt FALSE
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: Ticket Master configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "enable_review_prompt" as false
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)


GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store without a pre-existing rating
custom_steps: WHEN the user transitions to Home Tab
custom_expected: THEN the app rating prompt is NOT shown

title: Ballpark App icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/11796454)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigate to Home tab after navigating any other tabs on the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with App rating prompt 
AND user should see the Ballpark app icon on top of the prompt

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851884)

title: Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigate to Home tab after navigating any other tabs on the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with App rating prompt
AND user should see the Ballpark app icon on top of the prompt 
AND user should see the Header 

iOS: Enjoying Ballpark? 
Android: Ballpark

title: Body
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigate to Home tab after navigating any other tabs on the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with App rating prompt
AND user should see the Ballpark app icon on top of the prompt
AND user should see the Header
AND user should see the Body 

iOS: Tap a star to rate it on the App Store
Android: Reviews are only visible to developers and include your account and device info. Learn More

title: Not Now
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigate to Home tab after navigating any other tabs on the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with App rating prompt along with Icon, Header, Body 
AND user should also see the Not Now CTA 

Note: Not Now CTA should should dismiss the App rating modal on iOS/Android

title: Submit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigate to Home tab after navigating any other tabs on the app

AND there is App Rating prompt display
custom_steps_separated.expected:
TTHEN user should display with App rating prompt along with Icon, Header, Body
AND user should also see the Submit CTA to submit the review 

iOS: Submit button only clickable after user select the number of star 

Android: Submit CTA only clickable after user select Stars and write a review on Private Review box

title: App store review posted on respective app store
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
User should have valid app store account and logged into respective app store
custom_expected: NOTE: App/Play Store may have some delay in displaying the submitted review (iOS AppStore has shown 24 to 36 hrs)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigate to Home tab after navigating any other tabs on the app

AND user submit review
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a star rating will be posted to the app store. 

iOS: App Store ![](index.php?/attachments/get/11796174)

Android: Play Store

title: Opt out of receiving these rating prompts [IOS Only]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.6.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app


User opted out from Settings for receiving prompts![](index.php?/attachments/get/11796455)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigate to Home tab after navigating any other tabs on the app AND 
User opted out for receiving prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User should not see App Rating prompt on the app 

iOS: Settings -> App Store
